segments.text: What are you doing this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My brother-in-law is having a small get-together at his house and he invited me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it a family thing or just friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A bit of both . Some cousins , aunts and uncles will be there , but also some friends from the neighborhood .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is your great uncle Rick going to be there ? He is really funny .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah he is going to be there with his step-son and his ex-wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , Rick is actually my great uncle , so he is my grandmother's brother .
segments.speaker: S2
